projectGridLines.title: Product Management Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

Volt Money is revolutionizing financial technology! We're developing a cutting-edge tech stack designed to transform financial services operations, making it the most advanced system in the industry. As part of our team, you'll get hands-on experience building and managing innovative products such as Loan Management Systems, Loan Origination Systems, and KYC systems.

 

You'll collaborate with highly skilled engineers and designers on defining product vision, strategy, and roadmaps. You'll gain experience in market research, user experience design, and data-driven decision-making. Additionally, you'll work on exciting third-party integrations with organizations like UIDAI, Payment Gateways, Banks, and NPCI.

 

This is a unique opportunity to break into the exciting world of Fintech Product Management, work on impactful projects, and contribute to the future of financial technology. Come innovate with us at Volt Money!

 

Skill sets: Problem solving, analytics, stakeholder management, user research.

Traits expectation: Extreme ownership, Entrepreneurial Mindset, User-centric, Attention to detail,

Expected learning: You will get the opportunity to learn building fintech products and driving impact. End to end ownership of projects will jumpstart your career in product management.
